original_title: Indian origin Australian killed, two including her daughter injured in accident at Hemmathagama
original_body_lines: An Australian tourist of Indian origin was killed, her daughter and another injured when a car they were travelling in met with an accident at Dara Wanguwa in Hemmathagama.
Police said the driver of the car, a resident of Wattala and a 30-year-old woman who were injured in the accident were admitted to the Gampola Hospital.
The deceased was identified as a 67-year-old resident of Sydney, Australia.
